The 'Albion' is a Norfolk wherry. Built in 1898, she served as a trading vessel
and then as a lighter until being acquired by the Norfolk Wherry Trust for
restoration and preservation in 1949. Since 1981 she has been moored at the
Norfolk Wherry Trust wherry base at Womack Water near Ludham. She is listed on
the register of National Historic Ships in the United Kingdom.
